name: Goblin
description: A small and sneaky creature with green skin and sharp teeth.

name: Orc
description: A large and brutish humanoid with grayish-green skin and sharp tusks.

name: Skeleton
description: An undead creature made of bones and animated by dark magic.

name: Zombie
description: A walking corpse with rotting flesh and an insatiable hunger for brains.

name: Giant Spider
description: A terrifying arachnid with sharp fangs and venomous bite.

name: Troll
description: A massive and regenerating monster with thick skin and club-like fists.

name: Minotaur
description: A bull-headed creature with a powerful charge and deadly horns.

name: Manticore
description: A beast with the body of a lion, the wings of a bat, and the tail of a scorpion.

name: Chimera
description: A monstrous creature with the head of a lion, the body of a goat, and the tail of a serpent.

name: Dragon
description: A fearsome and powerful creature with razor-sharp claws and fiery breath.

name: Giant
description: A towering humanoid with incredible strength and a massive club.

name: Beholder
description: A floating orb with multiple eyes and deadly magical powers.

name: Kraken
description: A massive sea monster with tentacles that can crush ships.

name: Medusa
description: A creature with a body of a snake and the head of a woman, who can turn people into stone with her gaze.

name: Lich
description: An undead sorcerer with the power to raise armies of the dead.
